article_title: Father of Israeli hostage died day before son's rescue, relative says
sentence: The  father  of  an  Israeli  hostage  rescued  during  a  military  operation  in  Gaza  died  a  day  before  he  could  be  reunited  with  his  son,  a  relative  has  said.
